mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting(meetno, meeting_type, meetname, place, meetdate, manageno) VALUES(MEETING_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{meetingType}, #{meetName}, #{place}, #{meetDate}, #{manageNo})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMNO, MEETING_TYPE, MEETNO, MEETNAME, PLACE, to_char(MEETDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MEETDATE, TOTALFEE, MANAGENO FROM meeting_info WHERE MEMNO =#{memNo}
SELECT * FROM meeting where manageNo=#{manageNo} and meetNo = (select max(meetNo) from meeting where manageNo=#{manageNo})
SELECT MEETING_TYPE, MEETNO, MEETNAME, PLACE, to_char(MEETDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MEETDATE, TOTALFEE, MANAGENO FROM meeting where meetno = #{meetNo}
mapper.delete: delete from meeting where meetNo=#{meetNo} and manageNo=#{manageNo}
